definition: a thing should not be attempted more than three times (idiom)/don't repeat the same mistake again and again/bad things don't happen more than three times
matter/thing/item/work/affair/CL:件[jian4],樁|桩[zhuang1],回[hui2]
(negative prefix)/not/no
surname Guo
to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-
(experienced action marker)
surname San
three/3

sentences.english: The new legislation would have operated under a "three strikes" system.
sentences.chinese: 新的立法将在“事不过三”体系下运作。

sentences.english: Don't be late again. Three strikes and you're out.
